thread.title: RUMOURS: Everton want Premier League defender
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Everton want Premier League defender

title: RUMOURS: Everton want Premier League defender
text:
0 4 Jan 2017 09:46:35 Although the Toffees' first-choice target in January may be out of their reach, Ronald Koeman has marked a potential signing as he looks to shore up his defence 
Everton are planning a bid for Middledbrough centre-back Ben Gibson if they miss out on Southampton's Virgil van Dijk, according to reports from the Mirror . 
Ronaldo Koeman is determined to strengthen his backline in January, with the Dutchman his number one target, though it seems unlikely they will secure a deal for the Â£50 million-rated defender. 
The Toffees will turn their attention to Gibson, who has played every minute of Middlesbrough's Premier League campaign this season, with Burnley's Michael Keane another potential target.
